duties_responsibilities.duty: Process teller transactions, open new membership accounts, complete consumer loan applications, and provide general account information.
Identify members' financial needs and offer AFFCU products and services to fulfill their needs.
Strengthen relationships with members through face-to-face or phone conversations to cross-sell and up-sell credit union products and services.
Provide exemplary member experience that meets and exceeds members' expectations.
Accurately process financial transactions, including accepting and posting deposits and payments, cashing checks, making transfers, and preparing and processing account maintenance.
Maintain a balanced cash drawer and observe suspicious behavior, reporting any such activity to a Supervisor or security personnel.
Provide back up to all other employees as needed.
Perform all other duties as required.
